item.title: Central Student Hub
item.description: Table of Contents Link to heading Summary Summary Link to heading Implemented the Controller, Service, and Repository layers in the Backend for several components like Course, Grade, and Feedback Helped in the Frontend by implementing the HTML/CSS for the Login and Sign Up pages Developed and optimized the project Database using ER-Diagrams and Normalization Reviewed the code written by my teammates to ensure high standards for our project Used Jira to introduce time estimates for a better project management process Delivered several test cases that achieved - 100% code coverage
